For website/demo purposes we load more here than just core+icons

tiddlers.title: $TiddlerTypes
tiddlers.text:
* x-twiki: TWiki Data
* plain: Plain Text
* html: HTML
* html/template: HTML Template
* css: StyleSheet
* script/js: JavaScript
* markdown: Markdown
* macro: Macro
* list: List
* keyval: Key Values
* table: Tabular Data
* json: JSON Data
